task.title: Defining sequences
task.shortdesc: Collections of type "sequence" generate next and previous links in HTML-based output.

step.cmd: Add the topic references to a container.
step.info: The container could be another topic reference in a hierarchy, or a <topicgroup> element, or a table cell.

step.cmd: Set the collection-type attribute of the container to "sequence".

taskbody.result: When you generate XHTML from the map (for example as part of an HTMLHelp or Eclipse build), the topics in the sequence are given next and previous links to their adjacent siblings. When you generate PDFs, the next and previous links are ignored, since the sequence should be clear from the order of the assembled content.
